biotools.summary: BIAFLOWS is a collaborative framework to reproducibly deploy and benchmark bioimage analysis workflows. BIAFLOWS is a web platform centralizing Bio Image Analysis (BIA) workflows to automatically extract biological objects annotations from microscopy images.

bioschemas.name: BIAFLOWS
bioschemas.summary: BIAFLOWS is a collaborative framework to reproducibly deploy and benchmark bioimage analysis workflows. BIAFLOWS is a web platform centralizing Bio Image Analysis (BIA) workflows to automatically extract biological objects annotations from microscopy images.
